updates.title: COVID-19
updates.message:
Due to COVID-19 pandemic restrictions, we are working again (hooray!), but with limited services. Our plan now is to gradually reopen. More spacing between appointments gives us the time to keep everyone safe. This, however, requires an overhaul (change of date & time) of all prior scheduled appointments. If you have a prior appointment, please expect us to contact you two weeks in advance to confirm the changed date & time.

That said, please call us right away if you have an urgent dental need. We are always ready for phone calls to 610-345-0267, emails to SCCFD08@gmail.com, and through this app's Virtual Forms.
